page.title: 16TRANSPORT -TRAFFIC MOVEMENT.
page.content: Our social survey covered the movement from {Llanrhos} to the nearest town i.e.{Llandudno.}Our result showed that the train service was used very little due to the distance away from the nearest station.At least 50% owned one car,and 62% of the people interviewed used their car to travel the distance involved. The taxi and the bus service were used by 15% and 19% respectively, showing that the taxi was used more by the elderly people due to its convenience. The bus stops were quite far apart,and over half questioned were dissatisfied with the service. A small percentage,4% walked,this again could be due to the fact that well over 80% interviewed were pensioners.
